attributes.action: Implement a sensible points based system for immigration to the UK.
attributes.additional_details:
400,000 net migration forecasted for 2015
Surge of violence in countries such as Sweden between right wing groups and immigrants
Threat of increasing ghettoisation by ethnic groups
Increase in anti-semitism, caused a large part by Muslim immigration
Lack of housing,  especially for first time buyers
Health service at close to breaking pont as are education and transport services
Irreversible changes to British culture caused by lack of integration,  especially from Muslim groups
attributes.background: The UK is suffering from an unsustainable number of immigrants arriving in the UK each year,  creating huge socio-economic issues within the system, including the current housing crisis, a huge problem for first time buyers. 400,000 people arriving every year is detrimental to British culture
